journals.title: Semantic-enriched framework for asynchronous bidirectional BIM data exchange with immersive visualization platform
journals.abstract: This paper presents a comprehensive framework for BIM to Unity data exchange

journals.title: Advancing BIM and game engine integration in the AEC industry: innovations, challenges, and future directions
journals.journal: Journal of Computational Design and Engineering
journals.abstract: This paper presents a comprehensive framework for integrating Building Information Modeling (BIM) with game engines to revolutionize visualization and simulation in the Architecture, Engineering, and Construction (AEC) industry.

journals.title: Client-centered detached modular housing: Natural language processing-enabled design recommender system
journals.journal: Journal of Computational Design and Engineering
journals.abstract: This study introduces an AI-driven design recommendation system that leverages natural language processing to understand client requirements and generate tailored modular housing designs.

journals.title: Data-driven integration framework for four-dimensional building information modeling simulation in modular construction: a case study approach
journals.journal: Journal of Computational Design and Engineering
journals.abstract: This research develops a comprehensive data-driven framework for integrating 4D BIM simulation in modular construction projects, validated through multiple case studies.

journals.title: Mechanical properties of polyethylene-sand blocks produced from recycled plastic bags
journals.journal: International Journal of Scientific and Engineering Research
journals.abstract: Investigation of mechanical properties of sustainable construction blocks made from recycled polyethylene and sand composite materials.

conferences.title: Integration Of 4D BIM And VR For Interactive Modular Building Manufacturing Simulations In A Factory-Controlled Environment
conferences.abstract: This paper presents a novel approach to Integrated BIM and VR for modular manufacturing simulation.

conferences.title: Shape Grammar-Driven BIM Model Database for a Modular Building Design Recommender System
conferences.conference: The 10th International Conference on Construction Engineering and Project Management
conferences.abstract: This paper presents a novel approach to modular building design using shape grammar principles integrated with BIM databases.

conferences.title: An Analysis and Consolidation of DfMA Based Construction Guidelines and Its Validation Through a Korean Case Study
conferences.conference: International Conference on Geometry and Graphics
conferences.abstract: This paper consolidates various DfMA construction guidelines and validates them through a Korean case study.

conferences.title: Analysis of development of open BIM-based automated rule checking system in KBIM project
conferences.abstract: This study discusses the progress of automated rule checking in Korea’s national BIM project.

conferences.title: EXPERIMENTAL DETERMINATION OF ROTATIONAL STIFFNESS OF PARTIAL FIXITY JOINTS IN POST TENSIONED PRE-CAST STRUCTURE
conferences.abstract: An experimental investigation into the rotational stiffness of partial fixity joints in post-tensioned precast systems.

conferences.title: 4D BIM modeling of Insulated Concrete Sandwich Panel Building
conferences.conference: 1st Conference on Sustainability in Civil Engineering
conferences.abstract: This work demonstrates the application of 4D BIM to the planning and visualization of insulated concrete panel construction.

conferences.title: Experimental Determination of Capacity of Pile Group and Pile Raft Foundation
conferences.conference: 1st Conference on Sustainability in Civil Engineering
conferences.abstract: Study focuses on pile group behavior and raft foundation capacity via field experiments.

conferences.title: Experimental Study of Comparison of Settlement Behavior of Pile Raft Foundation with Batter and Vertical Piles
conferences.conference: 1st Conference on Sustainability in Civil Engineering
conferences.abstract: This paper compares settlement behavior in pile raft foundations with different pile orientations.

conferences.title: BIM Implementation of Reinforced Concrete Sandwich Panels
conferences.conference: 2nd Pak-Turk International Conference on Emerging Technologies in the Field of Sciences and Engineering
conferences.abstract: Implementation strategy of BIM for modeling and construction planning of reinforced concrete sandwich panels.

conferences.title: Finite Element Analysis of Brick Masonry
conferences.conference: 2nd Pak-Turk International Conference on Emerging Technologies in the Field of Sciences and Engineering
conferences.abstract: Presents finite element simulations to analyze behavior of traditional brick masonry under various loads.

conferences.title: Geotechnical Sub soil Profiling Using Geographic Information System
conferences.abstract: Geotechnical profiling integrated with GIS tools to support disaster resilience and site planning.
